arts.ttl: Highlights of Celtic v Dundee Utd & Killmarnock v Motherwell
arts.sum: Extended highlights of Celtic v Dundee Utd and Kilmarnock v Motherwell.

arts.ttl: Motherwell keep Derek McInnes’ Kilmarnock at bay
arts.sum: Kilmarnock had 16 shots, 14 corners and a goal ruled out – correctly – but they could not find a way past a resolute Motherwell defence.

arts.ttl: What Brendan Rodgers told Andy Halliday on Celtic Park pitch before Motherwell star responded 'I wanted to cane you'
arts.sum: Rodgers and Halliday were seen embracing on the pitch at full-time on Boxing Day

arts.ttl: Ewan Wilson reveals reason behind Motherwell fist bump celebration as he revels in Fir Park first
arts.sum: Steelmen starlet struck the opener in the 2-0 win over Aberdeen - his first ever professional goal

arts.ttl: Scott Brown gets Inter vs AC Milan name check as Celtic hero warned Kilmarnock legend 'still has your number'
arts.sum: Manuel Pascali was Manuel Pascali was on co-commentary duty for Premier Sport and attention turned to his time in Scotland
